page.title: 10Farm Animals
page.content: Newmills was once a farm but its owner now keeps battery hens.He has 5500 and they lay sizes of eggs from 1 to 7. There are 708 cows in our area. Trevallett farm owns 134 cows the most in our area.They also own a milk tank which holds 2266 litres of milk.There are also 1341 sheep in our area. Trevallett Farm and Trebursye Farm both own the same amount of sheep.They own 320 sheep.There are 54 hens in our area besides those at Newmills. Newchurches owns the most.They have got 30. Also some of the farms own their own bulls though artificial insemination is being practiced more and more.There are also some pigs in our area.
